items.name: Kentik
items.description: Kentik is a network observability platform that uses big data and AI to provide real-time network analytics, DDoS protection, and traffic optimization.

items.name: Datadog
items.description: Datadog is a monitoring and analytics platform for large-scale applications. It brings together data from servers, containers, databases, and third-party services to make your stack entirely observable.

items.name: Proxylity UDP Gateway
items.description: UDP Gateway provides a bridge between UDP traffic and compute, storage and event handling services in AWS with an automation-friendly IaC model that simplifies a wide varietry of observability and telemetric collection and processing models.

items.name: Pliant
items.description: Pliant [an IBM company] is a low-code automation platform that enables teams to quickly build, deploy, and scale workflows across IT operations, DevOps, and Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) functions. It provides a unified interface for automating complex processes across diverse technology stacks.

items.name: Spacelift
items.description: Spacelift is a sophisticated SaaS-delivered infrastructure management platform that enables infrastructure automation through software development practices.
